name: Deep (hortondev.chris)
description:
Deep is an endless digging game where you compete against yourself and others. I made it for my dad for Christmas in about a week. The music is O.R.B. by Arthur Tessier.

Controls:

ASD or arrow keys to move
[E] for the shop
[R] to quick restart
[M] to mute the music

All in game tips:

"Powerups bought in the shop only last for one round."
"Stone costs two oil to dig through while dirt only costs one."
"Fossils fill your tank to its limit!"
"Without powerups, you lose 40% of your gold after every round."
"Press [R] in the death screen to restart quickly."
"Press [M] to toggle the music."
"TNT can blow up adjacent TNT."
"When TNT explodes, it will destroy oil, however, you keep the gold from the blast."  "Visit hortondev.com for more games like this!"
"It costs a little bit to reroll for powerups."
"The Cheetah Drill makes you move 50% faster!"
"The Bigger Tank allows the drill to hold up to 20 fuel at once!"
"The Oil Spill increases the spawn rate of oil."
"Gold Rush increases the spawn rate of gold."
"The Pulverizer makes it so that stone only costs one oil to dig through."
"Boom Town increases the spawn rate of TNT!"
"Plunderer doubles the gold found in chests!"
"The Vault allows you to keep 100% of the gold earned from that round."
"Erosion lowers the spawn rate of stone."
"Black Gold makes gold give back fuel!"
